media:group.media:title: 8 Easy Tips in Manga Drawing
media:group.media:description:
1.Use pencil
(coz pens can't undo mistakes)

2.Concentrate on drawing not on coloring

3.Take your time drawing,don't rush.

4.Watch animes or read some mangas

5.Know your motivation/inspiration

6.It doesn't have to be realistic when drawing manga.

7.Focus your own artstyle

8.Minimize or exaggerate character details
